story_p1: We met in the spring of 2018 at a mutual friend's party. It was one of those rare moments when you just know. After years of adventures, laughter, and growing together, we can't wait to start this new chapter of our lives.
story_p2: We're so excited to celebrate our love with all of you!
details_food_drinks_p1: Cocktail hour with passed hors d'oeuvres
rsvp_attending_question: Will you be attending our wedding?
rsvp_success_message: Your response has been recorded. We can't wait to celebrate with you!
modal_text: You can view your invitation in a new tab or download it directly.
invitation_message: We cordially invite you to celebrate our marriage
invitation_bring_text: Please bring this invitation to the venue.
invitation_proof_text: This document serves as proof of RSVP.
footer_copyright: Â© 2025 Narce & Jemima's Wedding. All rights reserved.
alert_guest_not_found: Guest not found. Please contact the couple.
alert_contact_couple: Please contact the couple if you believe this is an error.
alert_no_image_generated: No invitation image generated. Please try again.
alert_failed_to_search: Failed to search guests. Please try again.
alert_failed_to_submit_rsvp: Failed to submit your RSVP. Please try again or contact the couple.
alert_failed_to_generate_image: Failed to generate image invitation. Please try again or contact the couple.
